entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @realDonaldTrump The GOP and WH are pulling out all the stops to try and steer the blame for testing delays away from the man who caused the testing delays. Trump is as guilty of murdering covid19 victims as if he had taken them out with a bullet on 5th avenue. Mass Murderer POTUS45.
